CELEBRATE IN STYLE

Welcome to the Padre Hotel, one of Bakersfield’s most unique and best wedding venues. Named “One of the Most Unique Hotels in the West” by Sunset Magazine, the iconic Padre Hotel Bakersfield will charm you with its unique blend of yesteryear and today.

Whether you envision a wedding location that is traditional or trend-setting, festive or formal, intimate or grand scale, in a lushly appointed dining room or on a city-scape rooftop, we will give you unlimited options to create your perfect wedding day in Bakersfield. Instead of cookie-cutter wedding hall, Padre’s wedding venues are beautifully designed with everything you need for your special day.

 

 

Contact our professional Event Team at 661-427-4900 and begin planning today.
